C

ChatClient - Class in stream
Client class for the TCP chat
ChatClient() - Constructor for class stream.ChatClient
 
ChatServer - Class in stream
Server class for the TCP chat
ChatServer() - Constructor for class stream.ChatServer
 
ClientThread - Class in stream
Thread that handle communication with a client

I

incrementCT(ClientThread) - Static method in class stream.ChatServer
Updates global variables (list and number of connected clients)

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class stream.ChatClient
Main method Accepts a connection, creates a client thread, receives and sends messages
main(String[]) - Static method in class stream.ChatServer
Main method Connects to a server, listens for messages and sends messages
MessageListener - Class in stream
Thread that listens for incoming messages

R

run() - Method in class stream.ClientThread
Receives a message from client and sends it back to everyone
run() - Method in class stream.MessageListener
Start the thread This will listen for messages and print them on the standard output

S

send(String) - Method in class stream.ClientThread
Sends a message in the chat
stream - package stream
